content: escape into the rhythmic stitches of this stylish yet practical crochet bucket hat iconic granny squares accent this packable sun hat for a look that s both nostalgic and current flip the brim for a cute peek-a-boo or wear it down for maximum shade in this pattern you ll get to practice crocheting a traditional granny square motif join as you go crochet techniques to seam the squares and then some simple increasing to make the top and brim of the bucket hat use the most retro colors you can find or stick to one solid color throughout for a more streamlined look this ad-free printable pdf download includes the full written patterns as well as detailed photo tutorials and links to video tutorials for some of the techniques used you ll need approximately 145 grams of worsted weight category 4 cotton yarn to complete this pattern in the following amounts color a approx 115 g color b approx 12 g color c approx 16 g this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew skill level - advanced beginner/intermediate sizing/measurements - one size fits most approx 22 circumference slight adjustments up or down in sizing can be accomplished by working the pattern with a smaller or larger hook downloading -
